MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY11 postcode area of Dunfermline, affecting properties in Hillend and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.50PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of extensive work required on our overhead line network near Vantage Farm and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 2.27PM on 31 October 2020.
